features: Encourage and support your kids during mealtime. Each stainless steel utensil is engraved with a unique motivating word that will help bring kids the CONFIDENCE, PATIENCE, KINDNESS, or BRAVERY they need to start and end their day
Each set includes four (4) pieces: one spoon engraved with "BRAVE", one spoon engraved with "CONFIDENT", one fork engraved with "PATIENT", one fork engraved with "KIND"
Each set comes in a high-quality, beautifully designed box, perfect for gifting. Send directly to your recipient, no need to gift wrap!
A great feeding tool for baby led weaning
Made from high-quality 430 stainless steel, the set is strong, durable, and dishwasher safe.
Perfect for lunchboxes, picnics, on-the-go, or at home
No cheap plastic handle - these stainless steel utensils are strong and durable, helping your child feel more grown up and part of the family
Appropriately designed and sized with a comfortable grip for small hands

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Not Your Regular Kid's Utensils The Perfect Grip You + Me babe Emotions Utensil Set looks like it's made for adults, but will fit perfectly in the palm of your little's hands. We all know our kids just want to feel *big*, and this set will help them feel just like you! Establishing Emotional Connections Our purpose is to help bridge the emotional gap between you and your big-feeling kid. We want every child to feel safe and heard while expressing their emotions. And it is our goal to create a safe space for such open conversations Specially Designed For Your Babe Kids will feel proud to know their new utensils were made just for them. Our rounded spoon and stronger fork prongs are designed to be more efficient for hand-eye coordination. Allowing kids to learn to self-feed much quicker! Exclusively Ours Our Emotions Set brings much more to the table. No childish cartoons or plastic grips, just pure love. It isn't just about eating, but the magic of connection that can occur at the dinner table.
each set is packaged + shipped in a beautifully detailed box, ready for gift giving!

be kind. We believe the most effective way to teach kindness, is to model it. Challenge each member of your family to practice an act of kindness during their day and make a plan to share your experiences at the dinner table! Write each act of kindness on a piece of paper and add it to the designated "kindness jar". Once the jar is full, celebrate as a family with a special movie night, pizza outing, or other fun reward!

be confident. Affirmations are a great way to build your child's (and your) confidence. "I Am Smart. I Am Kind. I Am Funny. I Am Enough.", or any version of your own affirmation can be life-changing. Say them together with your child, every morning or every night while looking in the mirror. And remind them that loving who you are is an absolute super power.

be patient. Taking turns is a great way to practice patience. Whether it's waiting for their favorite toy or to step in on an activity, taking turns helps teach kids it is possible to wait for fun things!

be brave. Acknowledging your child's fears is the first and most important step to helping them find their roar. Being brave can be scary! Share a story with your child about a time you were scared then had to be brave , and offer to let them "borrow your bravery"!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING! My daughter LOVES them!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We LOVE these! From messy mealtimes to playful culinary adventures, children’s utensils are the unsung heroes of the dining table. As a parent, I’ve experienced the joy of watching my little one learn to feed herself with CONFIDENCE, thanks to these wonderful tools. Designed with tiny hands and developing motor skills in mind, these utensils are not just practical but also incredibly adorable. With meaningful words, ergonomic handles, and sturdy construction, they make every mealtime a delightful experience for both kids and parents. Their safe materials and easy-to-clean design add peace of mind, knowing that my child is using utensils that are both functional and safe. Overall, these utensils have truly transformed mealtime into a fun and interactive learning experience, making them an essential addition to any household with young ones. Thank you for making a product that works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and durable
reviews.reviewText: Love this set! The utensils are modern and look great with my regular utensils. My daughter loves using them and said it makes her feel like a big kid. Love the sayings on them, great way to connect with your kids. Highly recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I never write reviews, but this has changed meal time for my family! This utensil set is exactly what I was looking for and more!! My little one refused to use any utensils unless they looked like mom and dad’s, which was starting to become a safety issue (think big fork almost going directly into eye). Thankfully I found this set and now it’s the only utensils he will use!! They fit perfectly in his hands and he thinks he’s using the same ones as mom and dad! The quality is another level. Real silverware yet light enough for tiny hands to maneuver and strong enough to hold giant ravolis. What I wasn’t expecting are the motivational words on these utensils. They make every meal special and I love that we can work on “patience” while eating or hand my son a reminder to be “brave” before he heads to daycare. These are genius!Emotions Utensil Set for Kids (4pcs) Stainless Steel Engraved with Motivational Words to Encourage Eating | Ages 2+ | Child Flatware Cutlery Set | Valentine's Day Gift for Toddlers and Kids

reviews.reviewText: I love the positive affirmations for kids!The packaging & product is very appealing as well as practical. They are dishwasher safe and the right size for my 2 1/2 year old. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewText: We love this set! My daughter is so excited to eat like a big girl. She requests the spoon and fork at every meal. She also loves the words on each piece. Great conversation starter! Quality is great too.
